resources.string: This’s a Math game and it have 4 levels as Novice, Easy, Medium, Guru.

To solve the expression, you’ll get 10 seconds and when you solve the problems press # and go to the next question. If you fail to answer the question writhing the time its automatically skip the question to the next.
The marks will calculate according to the game level and the time you answer each question. You’ll get 10 questions in every level.

Novice level - 2 Number Expressions 
 Easy level - 2 to 3 Number Expressions
 Medium level – 2 to 4 Number Expressions
 Guru level – 2 to 6 Number Expressions
